summary.Title: Assistant Restaurant Manager for Restaurant Havfruen - a Seafood Bistro
summary.JobHeadline: Assistant Restaurant Manager for Restaurant Havfruen - a Seafood Bistro
summary.Presentation:
Restaurant Havfruen in Nyhavn is a seafood bistro with a focus on freshly caught sustainable seafood from Danish waters.
We are currently looking for an Assistant Restaurant Manager.

JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Assistant Restaurant Manager for Restaurant Havfruen - a Seafood Bistro
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Restaurant Havfruen in Nyhavn is a seafood bistro with a focus on freshly caught sustainable seafood from Danish waters.

We are currently looking for an Assistant Restaurant Manager.


The position as Assistant Restaurant Manager is for the candidate who really enjoys working in the restaurant industry. You do already have experience in serving and now it’s time to now try yourself in a leadership position. The most important thing is that you are passionate about the industry and to provide good guest experiences.

As an Assistant Restaurant Manager, you will be part of the management team in the restaurant, where you will report directly to our Restaurant Manager. Together, it is your responsibility to lead and run the restaurant through lunch and evening service in our small but busy restaurant in Nyhavn.
It is therefore important that you want to familiarize yourself well with the menu, so that you can both help to give our guests the best possible experience, but also to help your colleagues to constantly get better.

We expect you to have experience with serving. Through courses in food and wine we would very much like to help you become even better, so that you are best equipped to handle the tasks as Assistant Restaurant Manager.

These tasks will include:
- Responsibility for the operation of the restaurant when the Restaurant Manager is not present.
- Shift planning in collaboration with the Restaurant Manager.
- Training of new colleagues.
- Constant improvement of the guest experience.

It will be possible to assign more tasks on an ongoing basis as you want moreresponsibility.

Who are we?Nyhavn is one of Copenhagens busiest destinations in the summer. We have many tourists as well as many local guests. We want to be the favorite place for both and you have to help us with that!

We are passionate about providing good experiences to our guests, while we place great emphasis on creating a good workplace for our team.

If you do not already know us, you can get to know us a little better here:
https://www.instagram.com/havfruen_nyhavn39/
https://www.restauranthavfruen.dk/

If the above sounds like something for you, then we look forward to hearing from you.

Send an application with CV and photo and feel free to tell us why you are the right candidate to become part of the team.

Please send your application to: soeren@restauranthavfruen.dk

We want the position filled as soon as possible, so we have the opportunity to give you a thorough training before a hopefully busy summer.

We are looking forward to hearing from you!

 

All the best, 

Søren and the Havfruen team
